CustomField.description: 1 = Contract - New 3 = Contract - Upsell 2 = Contract - Renewal 13= Contract - Downsell
CustomField.formula: CASE(Opportunity_Type__c, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud",1, "New Business - Expansion Portal",1, "Existing Business-Upsell", IF(MRR__c<0,13,3), "Existing Business-Professional Services",3, "Existing Business-Renewal",2,2)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1 = Contract - New 3 = Contract - Upsell 2 = Contract - Renewal 13= Contract - Downsell
CustomField.label: Netsuite Order Type
